thread.title: Shubhi Sharma's special gift for her fans
thread.title_full: Shubhi Sharma's special gift for her fans - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Shubhi Sharma's special gift for her fans
text:
Bhojpuri film world's popular actress, Shubhi Sharma, has a special gift for her fans this Dussehra. Shubhi will be seen in the role of a tough cop named Kiran Sinha in her upcoming film 'Ghulami'. Shubhi has been paired opposite Nirahua in the movie.
Known for her romantic image, the actress will be seen in a totally different character this time. Sunny Deol recently launched the music of the film where the entire industry was present.
Source: Bhojpurimedia.com
